page.title: 17OLD BUILDINGS, TORTHORWALD
page.content: {Castle} The ruin of the castle,which was a keep at the time of Robert Bruce stands at the top of Torthorwald hill. The immediate surrounding land is used for pony grazing. {Cruck Cottage} The thatched cottage was inhabited till 7 or 8 years ago. At the moment it is empty. {Mill} Farmers brought oats to the old mill which is now a ruin. {Schools} The original school is now a private house, the Industrial School is now the Village Hall. {Manse} The old church manse is now the Torr Hotel. {Smiddy} The old smithy is now a private house.
